Laboratory
Reticulocytes

Magnesium Level

Amylase
Blood, Routine, Collection: T;N, once
Lactate
Blood, Routine, Collection: T;N, once
amikacin Trough Draw Instructions
once, Draw level 30 minutes prior to 3rd or 4th dose administration. Please note accuracy of drug level is equivalent whether it is drawn with the 3rd or 4th dose
amikacin Peak Draw Instructions
once, Draw level 30 minutes after the end of the infusion of the 3rd or 4th dose. Please note accuracy of drug level is equivalent whether it is drawn with the 3rd or 4th dose
